fullplot: Harper is brought to Louisiana bayou country to investigate an attempted blackmail scheme. He soon finds out that it involves an old flame of his and her hellion of a daughter. What is more, he finds himself caught in a power struggle between the matriarch of the family and a greedy oil baron, who wants her property. Poor Harper! Things are not as straight-forward as they initially appeared.
plot: A big-city private detective travels to the Deep South to help out an old girlfriend who is being blackmailed.
title: The Drowning Pool
